@graph.name: MetaGoFlow metagenomics data products EMOBON00126 for Sampling Event EMOBON_IUIEilat_Wa_25
@graph.description:
This is a Research Object Crate containing results data from a MetaGOflow
workflow analysis of metagenomic data derived from European Marine Omics
Biodiversity Observation Network (EMO BON) project operated by the European
Marine Biological Research Centre (EMBRC).

Sampling station: Interuniversity Institute for Marine Sciences in Eilat
Sampling country: Israel
Sampling station lat/long: 29.5:34.916667
Sampling environment: water_column
Sampling station contact name: Miguel Frada
Sampling station contact ORCID id: nan
Sampling station ENA project number: PRJEB51656

EMO BON reference code: EMOBON00126
EMO BON source material id: EMOBON_IUIEilat_Wa_25

MetaGOflow run id: HVWGWDSX5.UDI211
